author: IGN
description:
Watch the release date trailer for Wildgate, the PVP multiplayer shooter from Moonshot Games. Wildgate blends tactical ship-to-ship combat with fast-paced first-person action. Evade deadly environmental hazards, search for powerful weapons and ship upgrades, and be the first crew to escape with the Artifact... or the last crew left flying. Wildgate is coming to PC in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Wildgate - Open Beta Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Demo Trailer for MIO: Memories in Orbit, a 2D exploration Metroidvania platformer developed by Douze Dixiemes. Players will explore the inner workings of the Vessel that's been overrun by machines that have gone haywire. Enhance learned abilities, uncover long-lost secrets, and save the ship from oblivion. MIO: Memories in Orbit is coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) with a demo available now on PC (Steam and Xbox PC).

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: MIO: Memories in Orbit - Official Demo Launch Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out a new look at the story and gameplay of MindsEye, which is set to be released released on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S on June 10, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: MindsEye - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out this announcement trailer for Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree, a stylish roguelike from Bandai Namco Studios. Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree draws from classical Japanese art with a whimsical spin on eastern mysticism. Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree is coming to PC and consoles on September 19, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree - Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
On today’s fix of Daily news: Black Myth Wukong is finally coming to Xbox, and Switch 2 games play nice with Switch 1. 

Presented by: Universal Orlando Resort, and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.
title: Black Myth: Wukong's Release Date Announced For Xbox Series X/S | IGN The Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Hide your flag. Find the enemy flag. Run it back, then defend for a minute to win it. 

Welcome to Last Flag: a fast-paced 5v5 shooter with showstopping contestants, set in a televised competition where strategy, teamwork, and chaos blend in the ultimate game of Capture the Flag. Last Flag is the debut title from Night Street Games, an independent game studio on a mission to build multiplayer games crafted with heart.

#IGN
title: Last Flag - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest gameplay trailer for Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, the action RPG from Leenzee Games. Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is a soulslike, action RPG set in the land of Shu during the dark and tumultuous late Ming Dynasty, plagued with warring factions and a mysterious illness spawning monstrous creatures. Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S on July 24, 2025.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the release date trailer for Mecha BREAK, the PvP mech assault game from Amazing Seasun Games. In the aftermath of the Catastrophe, a mysterious carbon-silicon mineral known as Corite has breathed new life into Earth's depleted energy industry. But its gift came with a curse — its pathogenic nature and uncontrollable spread are slowly devouring the last habitable spaces on the planet. Within 30 years, the heavily polluted Marcens Zones threaten to engulf the entire globe, pushing humanity to the brink of extinction. Mecha BREAK is coming to PC and Xbox Series X|S on July 1, 2025.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Mecha BREAK - Official Release Date Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at ILL in this unsettling new trailer for the upcoming first-person action/horror game from developer Team Clout in collaboration with Mundfish Powerhouse. In ILL, something sinister has awakened within a vast research fort. This mysterious source of evil and the horrific Aberrations it spawned stand in the protagonist's way to save what matters most to him. Unleash your survival instincts, as ILL will make you feel every second of the struggle for survival. ILL will be available on Steam, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: ILL - Official Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Acts of Blood is a Beat ‘em up, Action, 3rd person game which focuses on fast-paced, brutal hand-to-hand combat. Set in dystopian city of Bandung, Indonesia.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Acts of Blood - Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
IGN's Max Scoville shares a special look at FX’s Alien: Earth, a new original series from Creator Noah Hawley and Executive Producer Ridley Scott. The series inspired by the legendary Alien film franchise premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.

Presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.

#IGN
title: FX’s Alien: Earth – Special Look and Official Trailer | IGN Summer of Gaming 2025

author: IGN
description:
The characters may be small, but the stakes couldn't be bigger! Join Capt. Awkney in his search for a new home for his people in Infinitesimals, from Cubit Studios. Coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC via the Epic Game Store in 2026.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Infinitesimals - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for Fractured Blooms, the first-person horror game from Serenity Force. Inspired by a true story, Fractured Blooms seems at first like a cozy gardening and cooking sim, but there’s something truly terrible that lurks under its surface. Fractured Blooms is coming to Steam, release date TBD.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Fractured Blooms - Official Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Out of Words is a Co-Op Platformer Adventure about the doubt and confusion that comes with communicating first-time love. Lovingly handcrafted and hand animated, the adventure is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC via the Epic Game Store in 2026!

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Out of Words - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
On their last night together, three friends embark on one final adventure. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly curated playlist draws three friends into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. Players will immerse themselves in the teenage wasteland by playing through a mixtape of joyful gameplay, from skateboarding and flying to taking photos after hours at an abandoned theme park, hitting baseballs, and putting on a fireworks show from the backseat of a car. It's the greatest hits of the teenage experience, from the first kiss to the last dance.

Featuring music from DEVO, Roxy Music, Lush, The Smashing Pumpkins, Iggy Pop, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Joy Division, The Cure and many more. 

Developed by Beethoven and Dinosaur. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Mixtape - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Bricks who click together, stick together. LEGO Voyagers is a new 2-player co-op adventure that’s all about building spaceships, excitement and friendships. Share a screen or play online – whatever works for you. The game will also feature Friend’s Pass, allowing you to play together using just one purchased copy of the game. Grab your brick buddy and get ready for an incredible adventure! Coming soon to PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: LEGO Voyagers - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at the announcement trailer for Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny. Join Spongbob Squarepants and the gang for some colourful combat in a stylish cartoon world. Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny is coming to PC and consoles in Fall 2025.

#IGN #SummerGameFest

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Dying Light: The Beast in this new trailer for the upcoming standalone zombie adventure game set in a tightly-crafted rural region. The latest Dying Light: The Beast trailer shows gameplay and a release date announcement. Dying Light: The Beast will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on August 22, 2025. In Dying Light: The Beast, play as Kyle Crane, a legendary hero who breaks free after years of brutal experiments. Now, he must realize there’s more at stake than just revenge.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Gameplay and Release Date Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a quick new look at Mouse: P.I. For Hire, the stylish black and white first-person shooter from Fumi Games. Join private investigator Jack Pepper on a guns blazing, jazz-fueled adventure. Mouse combines the charm of hand-drawn rubber hose animation inspired by the classic cartoons of the 1930’s with the adrenaline and action of an explosive first person shooter. Mouse P.I. For Hire is coming to Xbox, PS4, PS5, and Nintendo Switch in 2025.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire - Official June 2025 Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching 21 October and available to pre-order now on Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation Store, and Xbox Store. 

The next entry in the award-winning series, Jurassic World Evolution 3 puts you in control of building and running your very own Jurassic World. Nurture generations of awe-inspiring dinosaurs with the series debut of juveniles, create and manage sprawling prehistoric parks around the globe, and let your imagination roar with powerful new creative options.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

description:

description:
Cross the bounds of time in Lies of P: Overture They were waiting in the dark. Now they rise. Face fierce new bosses and carve your path through the shadows of Krat’s history. Lies of P: Overture is a brutal new expansion to the acclaimed Soulslike/Action RPG. Will you survive what came before? Available now.

author: IGN
description:
Check out this 'Rivalry' 30 Second Spot for Superman, the upcoming DC Studios film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Take a look at some new shots from Superman, in theaters on July 11.

Superman stars David Corenswet in the dual role as Superman/Clark Kent, Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane, and Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor. The film also stars Skyler Gisondo as Jimmy Olsen, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Sara Sampaio, Maria Gabriela de Faria, Wendell Pierce, Alan Tudyk, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Neva Howell, Beck Bennett as Steve Lombard, Mikaela Hoover as Cat Grant, and Christopher McDonald as Ron Troupe. 

Superman is executive produced by Nikolas Korda, Chantal Nong Vo and Lars Winther. Behind the camera, Gunn is joined by frequent collaborators, including director of photography Henry Braham, production designer Beth Mickle, costume designer Judianna Makovsky and composer John Murphy, along with editors Craig Alpert (“Deadpool 2,” “Blue Beetle”), Jason
title: Superman - Official 'Rivalry' 30 Second Spot (2025) David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan

description:
Get your first look at the announcement trailer for Felt That Boxing, the puppet-based pugilism game from Sans Strings Studio. Felt That Boxing combines comedic storytelling with intense arcade fighting action. Felt That Boxing is coming to Steam, release date TBD.

author: IGN
description:
Check out this official playtest trailer for Chrono Odyssey, a next generation MMORPG from Kakao Games. When the void calls, heroes must rise. Join the sentinels, defy time and space, and wield the power of the gods. Chrono Odyssey is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. You can join the playtest on Steam on June 20 to June 22, 2025.  

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Chrono Odyssey - Official Playtest Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Rise from survival to greatness and challenge the power of an Imperium in Dune: Awakening, a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale. Survive the sandworm, craft your ornithopter, build a fortress, and ascend to power on an open world Arrakis shared with hundreds of other players.

Your time has come. Arrakis awaits. Buy the Deluxe or Ultimate Edition to play in the head start now.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Launch Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the official release date trailer for ARC Raiders, the upcoming multiplayer extraction adventure from Embark Studios. ARC Raiders is set in a lethal future earth, ravaged by a mysterious mechanized threat known as ARC. Enlist as a Raider and thrive in a desolate world. Shape your legacy as you scavenge the lethal surface and build your home in the underground neighborhood of Speranza. ARC Raiders is coming to PC and consoles on October 30, 2025.

#IGN #SummerGameFest
title: ARC Raiders - Official Release Date Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
The next evolution of the Nintendo Switch system is here! Enjoy your games on a bigger 1080p screen, or connect to a TV and play in up to 4K resolution, plus frame rates up to 120 fps with compatible games and displays. Don’t miss out on Mario Kart World, which is exclusive to the Nintendo Switch 2 system!

Presented by Nintendo.

#MarioKartWorld #Gaming #IGN
title: Mario Kart World - New Characters, Collectibles, Knockout Tour & more!  | IGN Summer of Gaming 2025

description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, the tech demonstration and tour game of Nintendo's latest hardware developed by Nintendo. Get acquainted with the system while playing mini-games to discover and uncover over 170 secrets the system holds. Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour is available now for Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
IO Interactive, the developer and publisher behind, among others, the internationally acclaimed HITMAN franchise, has its first IOI SHOWCASE! The live event wil reveal details from the celebrated game creator’s properties and its publishing branch IOI Partners, including HITMAN, MindsEye, and 007 First Light. The developer and publisher presentation will take place on June 6th at 6pm PDT and will include updates, trailers, and a host of surprises.

#IGN
title: IOI Showcase June 2025 Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Freakier Friday trailer for this upcoming comedy movie sequel to the Disney classic starring Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan. Freakier Friday opens in theaters on August 8, 2025.

In the film, Curtis and Lohan reprise their roles as Tess and Anna Coleman. The story picks up years after Tess (Curtis) and Anna (Lohan) endured an identity crisis. Anna now has a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter. As they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover that lightning might indeed strike twice. 

Freakier Friday is directed by Nisha Ganatra and based on the book Freaky Friday by Mary Rodgers. The film, which also stars Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons, Manny Jacinto, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Rosalind Chao, Chad Michael Murray, Vanessa Bayer, and Mark Harmon, is produced by Kristin Burr, p.g.a., Andrew Gunn, p.g.a., and Jamie Lee Curtis, with Nathan Kelly, Ann Marie Sanderlin, and Lindsay Lohan serving as executive producer
title: Freakier Friday - Official Trailer (2025) Lindsay Lohan, Jamie Lee Curtis

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Origin Story' Clip for Long Way Home, an upcoming documentary distributed by Apple TV Plus. Hear how Long Way Home got started straight from Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman as they shared a common bond to see the world and the people that make it so. Long Way Home is streaming now on Apple TV Plus.

Long Way Home follows Ewan and Charley as they ride refurbished vintage motorbikes from Ewan’s home in Scotland to Charley’s in England — but rather than take the shortest route, they go the long way! They head across the North Sea to Scandinavia, all the way up to the Arctic Circle and then down to the Baltics and through continental Europe, before eventually hopping back over the English Channel two months later. It’s an adventure that will take them to more than fifteen countries, through spectacular scenery and along some of the greatest driving roads in the world. Along the way they’ll immerse themselves in each country’s culture, meet the locals, and try their hand at un
title: Long Way Home - Exclusive 'Origin Story' Clip (2025) Ewan McGregor, Charley Boorman

author: IGN
description:
Here are 5 things to know about How To Train Your Dragon. #sponsored 

#IGN
title: Here are 5 things to know about How To Train Your Dragon. #sponsored

author: IGN
description:
When 13-year-old Willis Gibson becomes the first person to beat Tetris, his life changes overnight. BLUE SCUTI: Tetris Crasher is a coming-of-age story about overcoming grief, the power of community, and the rise of an unexpected internet legend.

BLUE SCUTI: Tetris Crasher, the first documentary film from Legendary’s Unscripted division, will make its world premiere at the 2024 Tribeca Film Festival on June 11. It is directed by acclaimed filmmaker Chris Moukarbel (Gaga: Five Foot Two, Banksy Does New York, Cypher).

#IGN #Gaming #Movies #Tetris
title: Blue Scuti: Tetris Crasher Exclusive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Your next Pokemon adventure awaits! Catch, battle and Mega Evolve in Pokemon Legends: Z-A. Check out the latest Pokemon Legends: Z-A trailer for this upcoming action RPG. Pokemon Legends: Z-A will be available on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on October 16, 2025.

#IGN #Pokemon #Gaming
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tristan Ogilvie gives his early impressions from the first few hours with The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition.

"The Nintendo Switch 2 has finally arrived, and call me crazy but I’ve opted to celebrate its launch by playing the same game I played day one on the original Switch: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. This Nintendo Switch 2 Edition is of course an enhanced version with visual upgrades, faster loading times, and support for the Zelda Notes service via the Nintendo Switch App on your mobile device. It’s admittedly a fairly modest upgrade in terms of actual new features or content, but a welcome one, and it makes this undoubtedly the best way to play a sprawling epic that still stands tall as one of the greatest achievements in Nintendo’s iconic adventure series."
title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Review Update

author: IGN
description:
Predator: Killer of Killers, reviewed by Eric Goldman.
Predator: Killer of Killers definitely delivers on its premise. Its journey through several time periods is the perfect way to give us multiple Predator stories that each have their own distinct flavor and action highlights. As he established with Prey, director Dan Trachtenberg is exactly the right fit for this franchise, understanding how to provide both Predators and human characters who can kick ass and creatively prove their mettle, no matter which side of the hunt they begin on.
title: Predator: Killer of Killers Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Secrets of the Atlas Trailer for Path of Exile, an upcoming expansion to the free-to-play dark fantasy action RPG developed by Grinding Gear Games. Players will begin to deal with the ramifications of tears appearing in the Atlas, leading to different realities. Track down the source of the tears and uncover the secrets within. The new Secrets of the Atlas expansion is fitted with an additive endgame storyline, a new type of endgame item influence, three new endgame bosses, a new challenge league, dozens of new unique items, and much more. The Secrets of the Atlas expansion for Path of Exile is launching on June 13 for PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Path of Exile - Official Secrets of the Atlas Trailer
